sections.heading: to 71-4-8 - Repealed.Section 71-4-9 to 71-4-20 - Repealed.
sections.text:
Repeals.— Laws 1981, ch. 379, § 22, repealed 71-4-1 through 71-4-8 NMSA 1978, relating to energy research and development.

Laws 1981, ch. 379, § 23, provided that the effective date of Laws 1981, ch. 379, § 22, was the first day after the date that the secretary of energy and minerals has certified to the governor in writing that a transition plan has been fully implemented pursuant to Subsection B of Section 13 of the Energy Research and Development Institute Act.

sections.heading: to 71-4-20 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1986, ch. 38, § 14 repealed 71-4-9 through 71-4-20 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1981, ch. 379, the Energy Research and Development Institute Act, effective February 28, 1986. For present comparable provisions,see9-15-16 NMSA 1978 et seq.
